ComicInfo.Summary:
EIGHTEEN FOREVER, PART THREE
The penultimate issue of Zenescope's longest-running series, GRIMM FAIRY TALES!
After fleeing from Arcane Acre, our heroes find themselves facing off against Bloody Bones' final defense: the gargantuan Kraken! As we race toward a conclusion 125 issues in the making, the students of Arcane Acre say goodbye to a dear friend... and Ali makes a devastating choice that might tip the balance in the war against Bloody Bones.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Abhishek Malsuni & Neeraj Menon | 1 | B | Cover B | Jose Luis & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Billy Tucci & Wes Hartman | 3 |
